title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1243.1 - Wharfage, definition of
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1243.1 - Wharfage, definition of

State Regulations
A charge assessed against the cargo or vessel on all
cargo passing or conveyed over, onto, or under wharves or between vessels (to
or from barge, lighter, or water), when berthed at wharf or when moored in slip
adjacent to wharf. Wharfage is solely the charge for use of wharf and does not
include charges for any other service. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1243.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
